FAQ
Are Adult Websites Allowed?
Yes we allow Adult Websites.
What Payment Methods do you Accept?
We Accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Cards, Western Union and More.
What OS do you Provide?
We Provide only Linux Operating System
Can i upgrade my service anytime without losing my current data?
Yes. You can upgrade your service anytime without losing your current data.
How long will i have to wait for my service to be activated after making payment.
Your service will be activated within 24 hours after making your payment. Most of the orders are activated within few hours after making payment.

Refund Policy:
1) If we doesn't provide server within 48 hours, you are eligible to get refund.
2) If there is any issue with hardware and we are not fix it then you will be provided refund.
3) If customer host a content that is disallowed on TOS, No refund will be given and account will be directly suspended.
